text: 34|23|Avaṉuṭaiya aṉumati peṟṟa (vāṉa)varkaḷait tavira maṟṟavarkaḷ avaṉiṭattil parintu pēcuvatum payaṉaḷikkātu. (Allāhvuṭaiya oru kaṭṭaḷai piṟakkum camayattil avarkaḷ payantu naṭuṅkukiṉṟaṉar.) Avarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷattil iruntu naṭukkam nīṅkiyatum (avarkaḷil oruvar maṟṟavarkaḷai nōkki) ‘‘uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉ eṉṉa kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭāṉ?'' Eṉṟu kēṭpārkaḷ. Ataṟku maṟṟavarkaḷ ‘‘ (iṭavēṇṭiya) niyāyamāṉa kaṭṭaḷaiyaiyē iṭṭāṉ; avaṉō mikka mēlāṉavaṉ, mikap periyavaṉ āvāṉ'' eṉṟu kūṟuvārkaḷ
